# Abraham Duran — Brand Colors

> Canonical brand color reference for Abraham Duran. Use these colors when designing social media content, client deliverables, or personal branding materials.

The full structured data is available at: https://brand.abrahamduran.com/colors.json

## Colorimetry Palette (Personal Color Analysis — Winter Season)

These are the foundational colors derived from a professional colorimetry analysis. Abraham's season is Winter: cool undertones, high contrast.

### Main Colors

- **Blanco Puro** #FFFFFF — Highlights facial freshness
- **Negro** #000000 — Elegant, flattering contrast
- **Azul Marino** #0B1F3B — Sophisticated, less severe than black
- **Rojo Cereza** #D2042D — Adds life and luminosity to the face
- **Rojo Frambuesa** #E30B5D — Softer but equally flattering
- **Verde Esmeralda** #50C878 — Intense, refreshing, complements cool undertones
- **Verde Pino** #01796F — Deeper green, adds elegance
- **Púrpura Berenjena** #4C1C64 — Deep and dramatic, ideal for winter skin
- **Lavanda Fría** #C3B6E6 — Soft color maintaining harmony with skin tone

### Neutrals

- **Gris Carbón** #36454F — Sophisticated, versatile neutral
- **Gris Acero** #71797E — Softer but equally impactful

## Brand Palette 1 (Primary)

Role-based palette for digital and UI use.

- **Primary:** Azul Noche Caribe #174077 — Cool navy; authority without washing out medium neutral skin
- **Secondary:** Esmeralda Estudio #007A7E — Blue-green; works with props and studio backgrounds
- **Secondary:** Frambuesa Fuerte #B0005B — Deep raspberry; balances cool tones, good contrast with cool greys
- **Accent (Energy):** Rojo Cereza Flash #D90F4B — Saturated cherry; energy without warm orange
- **Accent (Calm):** Lavanda Fría #9AA3FF — Blue-biased lavender; calm and tech without warm pastel
- **Neutral (Dark):** Negro Nórdico #0B0D14 — Near-black; avoids #000 banding in photos
- **Neutral (Mid):** Gris Acero #5A6B7A — Cool mid-grey respecting blue undertone
- **Neutral (Light):** Gris Niebla #E8EDF5 — Very light cool; maintains cleanliness over photos
- **Background (Light):** Fondo Claro Ártico #F5F7FB — Blue-white; better than pure white for long reads
- **Background (Dark):** Fondo Oscuro Nocturno #0B0D14 — Cool dark for drama and image focus
- **CTA:** CTA Cereza #D90F4B — Same cherry; stands out in UI and thumbnails
- **Link:** Azul Hipervínculo #1463FF — Accessible, familiar blue; works in tech branding
- **Utility:** Gris Borde Frío #D4DAE3 — Cool neutral; use at 10-30% opacity for shadows

## Brand Palette 2 (Alternative)

Alternative generated palette with the same role structure but different values.

- **Primary:** Azul Noche Caribe #0A2540
- **Secondary:** Esmeralda Estudio #007A6E
- **Secondary:** Rojo Cereza #B10F2E
- **Accent:** Azul Eléctrico #1D4ED8
- **Accent:** Lavanda Fría #6F6DEB
- **Neutral (Dark):** Gris Carbón #2B2F36
- **Neutral (Mid):** Gris Pizarra #6B7280
- **Neutral (Light):** Gris Acero #A3AFBF
- **Background (Light):** Fondo Claro #F6F8FB
- **Background (Dark):** Fondo Oscuro #0B0E13
- **CTA:** Azul Marino Activo #0B3D91
- **Link:** Azul Profundo Enlace #1E40AF
- **Utility:** Borde Frío #CBD5E1
